Author: Schroder_Kid

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,979Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 2,064

entry.title: The Last Amber Sign: The Price of Survival
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,089Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 4

Summary: In the whispers of the resistance, they say the Linaje are immortal. That the Argents are invincible.But Derek Hale has seen his family’s blood spilled, and the truth is something else.Now, he leads a group of rebels on desperate missions, challenging the shadows that rule the world. But everything changes when an encounter with a stranger — a man who carries secrets more dangerous than death itself — puts at risk something far more dangerous than an end: the chance to change the future.In a game where even magic costs more than any life, Derek will have to decide how far he’s willing to go to destroy the Argent regime... and how much he’s willing to sacrifice to save himself and humanity.

entry.title: Night School
entry.summary:
Author: Strawberriesandspoons

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,319Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 47

Summary: Stiles was not expecting to spend his evening being chased around school by a giant Alpha werewolf, and he’ll be so pissed if he ends up getting gutted at his fucking high school.That’s like, the worst place to die, ever.And he also wasn’t expecting Allison, Lydia, and Jackson to show up, either, just when he thought the night couldn’t get any worse. Now they’ve got to explain what the fuck that monster was and why the hell it’s here.

entry.title: Iron Gilded Void
entry.summary:
Author: DaisyBeats

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,476Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 304

Summary: Things fall apart for Stiles in Beacon Hills and he and the Hale men in his life end up with his uncles in New York City. "Guys, it's fine," Stiles said, stepping forward. "Stiles, it’s not fine!" Derek snapped, not taking his eyes off James. "Do you fucking know who that is?!" Stiles blinked at him, then at Peter, whose entire body was coiled so tightly he looked ready to launch himself at James at any second. With a sigh, Stiles rubbed his face. “Yes. That’s Uncle James.”

entry.title: Guided by a Beating Heart
entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 68,248Chapters: 50/54Kudos: 60

Summary: (Further continuation of Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU)After defeating their second Goa'uld System Lord in less than a year, the residents of Beacon Hills must adapt to their ever-changing world.Cora Hale has broken the family curse, but now she must continue her work of rehabilitating the Hale-Littlefield Pack while keeping Beacon Hills safe for all its residents.Stiles Stilinski continues his journey of recovery and self-discovery after his possession.Derek Hale faces new challenges as he starts going on offworld missions through the Stargate.

entry.title: Blood Magick
entry.summary:
Author: misfitmonarchy

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,240Chapters: 3/7Kudos: 39

Summary: “Freeze! You--” Derek lunges and catches the wildling’s ankle. He grins, all teeth, and yanks the scrambling man so that the wildling’s body falls flat. It’s not too uncommon to find wildlings outside of cities, but they tended to wander the trade routes or at least areas with better shelter.The wildling’s arms are strong enough to fight back, and if he weren’t inhibited by his wolf’s strength, Derek presumes it would be quite a fight. As it were, he pinned the thief easily, chest down and flailing like a huffing like an animal.“Have nothing to say, thief?”--Derek and his pack of werewolves are fur traders working their way through the winter trading route when one evening, a thief is discovered after stealing their wares. Caught red handed, they take the thief prisoner and discover that the thief is much more than he seems

entry.title: the beginning of everything
entry.summary:
Author: vipertooths

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,666Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 955

Summary: He's only a few yards from the front porch, the same one he's sat at semi-regularly for years now. The front door isn't broken on its hinges like he's used to, isn't banged up and scratched, and he finds himself staring at it, trying to sort through the possibilities of what could be going on. The most obvious answer is the one he's really, really trying not to contemplate.He's in the past. He's in the god damned past.

entry.title: The Alpha's List
entry.summary:
Author: Vampire_Finch

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 66,912Chapters: 24/26Kudos: 309

Summary: In the Game of Love, he Made the Rules. The Honorable Derek Hale, Marquis of Redbridge.He is aristocratic, excessively handsome, excessively wealthy, aloof, reserved, arrogant and the powerful Alpha of one of the most renowned packs in the country. He has been an elusive prize for years, the target of desperate society Omega and their matchmaking mothers. But he is not swayed by flirtatious smiles and fine looks, social climbers and fortune hunters. He wants more.When his lack of an Omega causes concern to his mother, uncle and pack a remedy is suggested in the form of a suitable match. Derek draws up a list of qualifications and attributes for his future mate. Can any Omega hope to win the heart of such a demanding bachelor and cynic?Stiles Stilinski the Omega son of a clergyman can only try his best. The Marquis is not sure whether he has discovered the perfect Omega… Or the been the victim of a cruel hoax.

entry.title: The Creator's Game
entry.summary:
Author: Glitter_Lips

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,728Chapters: 10/38Kudos: 21

Summary: Alec has been a Beacon Hills resident and a McCall pack member for just over a year, and he’s finally starting to feel comfortable and safe after his near death experience at the hands of Monroe and her hunter army. He doesn’t want to get involved in the war ever again, content to play lacrosse and live his life.But Monroe isn’t finished yet, and she won’t rest until all supernatural people are wiped out for good. Her plans won’t allow Alec to stay uninvolved forever, and his past threatens to catch up with him no matter how badly he had hoped to keep those secrets buried.
